attributes.action: order a redesign of the London 2012 Olympics logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The London 2012 logo is a cringeworthy embarrassment devoid of meaning and visually offensive.  The logo should be redesigned, preferably as a result of a competition open to members of the public -- a process that would truly reflect the inclusive Olympic spirit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
